title.rendered: Findlay Beveridge Appointed as Managing Director of DeepDrill Solutions

content.rendered:
We are excited to announce that former DeepDrill Solutions sales director Findlay Beveridge has been promoted to the managing director role at DeepDrill Solutions, to lead the growth of DeepDrill Solutions as a Deep Drill company.

Mr Beveridge said: “I am delighted to have returned to the leadership role with DeepDrill Solutions and look forward to navigating the business through this transition period to build upon the strong foundations already in place here.

Beyond that, we will manage the integration of the DeepDrill Solutions brand and proprietary product line with Pryme’s manufacturing expertise to help capture increased market share.”
You can read the full press release at here Energy Voice.
